meanings.definition: The act of twisting or turning something.
meanings.sent1: Her delicate twistings of the ribbon made a beautiful bow.
meanings.sent2: The twistings of the rope created a strong knot.
meanings.sent3: The twistings of the spaghetti on his fork amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The twistings of fate brought them together in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The intricate twistings of the vines in the forest were mesmerizing.

meanings.definition: A series of turns or bends in a road or path.
meanings.sent1: The twistings of the mountain road made for a thrilling drive.
meanings.sent2: We followed the twistings of the river as it meandered through the valley.
meanings.sent3: The twistings of the maze confused the little mouse.
meanings.sent4: The twistings of the roller coaster track added excitement to the ride.
meanings.sent5: The twistings of the labyrinth led them to the hidden treasure.
